title: More Like Her
description: A brilliant, hilarious, and touching story from the author of Conversations with the Fat Girl , Liza Palmer’s More Like Her is smart, funny, though-provoking women’s fiction in the vein of Emily Giffin, Marian Keyes, Meg Cabot, and Jane Green. More Like Her is the story of a seemingly perfect woman who’s the envy of her friends, neighbors, and co-workers…until the life of the object of their jealousy spectacularly, unexpectedly, and disastrously explodes. A novel of secrets, disappointments, false impressions—and what really goes on behind those suburban picket fences— More Like Her is ultimately about facing reality and appreciating everything that life has to offer.
author: Liza Palmer
